feed.title: Tusky Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tusky: Tusky 27.0
entry.content:
• The compose screen shows a warning icon again when attached media has no description https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4806
  • Improves the hashtag bar at the end of posts https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4802 https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4811
  • Makes sure the compose screen is never hidden when bringing the app to the foreground https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4813 https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4818

For changes since v26.2 see CHANGELOG.md.

If you like Tusky, consider supporting us on Open Collective!

entry.title: New release for Tusky: Tusky 27.1
entry.content:
New features and other improvements

  • The width of the tab indicator has been increased https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4849

Significant bug fixes

  • Improves rendering of some animated custom emojis https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4281
  • Fixes an issue where the input field for media descriptions was too small in some cases https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4831
  • Fixes an issue where hashtags at the end of posts were duplicated https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4845
  • Fixes an issue that prevented lists from being edited https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4851

If you like Tusky, consider supporting us on Open Collective!

entry.title: New release for Tusky: Tusky 27.2
entry.content:
Significant bug fixes

  • The title of a hashtag tab now shows the actual hashtags again (instead of just "Hashtags") https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4868
  • Makes sure the background color of a dialogs is correct https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4864
  • Fixes an issue where Tusky would freeze while loading a timeline gap https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4865

If you like Tusky, consider supporting us on Open Collective!

entry.title: New release for Tusky: Tusky 28.0
entry.content:
Significant bug fixes - Fixes a bug where media previews would flicker when interacting with a post https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4971 - Tusky now ignores invalid publishing dates of preview cards that caused some posts not to load https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/4993

For changes since v27.2 see CHANGELOG.md

If you like Tusky, consider supporting us on Open Collective!

entry.title: New release for Tusky: Tusky 29.0
entry.content:
• Fixes a rare crash because the server did not provide the size information of an attachment https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/5114
  • Fixes an issue where filtering boosts from the home timeline did not work https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/5116
  • Fixes the default of the "Confirm Favorites" setting https://github.com/tuskyapp/Tusky/pull/5119

For changes since v28 see CHANGELOG.md.

If you like Tusky, consider supporting us on Open Collective!
